Name: Silver Lines
About the game: Play by listening to a line from a movie while choices of actors or movies appear on screen. Pick the correct actor and/or movie the line comes from. The faster you answer the greater your score. Some takes may show choices by name, others by image. Play 8 takes per round. How many rounds can you go? Challenge yourself in solo play, or sign up to level up, earn golden tickets, challenge your friends or the community, access cross-platform leaderboards, or suggest more movies. Your details will never be shared. Get the best scores, unlock those achievements and show everyone the master of the silver screen you truly are! Featuring Filmdom Acting Moments Thousands of acting moments throughout fildmdom's Eras and Genres. Challenge yourself and find out how far you can go. Challenges Signup and get access to cross-platform challenges after every round. Send your great run as a challenge to a friend or the community. Couch-Multiplayer Gather with friends and go against each other via local WiFi in free-for-all or team-based couch multiplayer matches. Who's that one friend that's definitely in your team? Best experienced with headphones on
